verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: railed] [ARG1: against Mexico and Canada 's efforts in renegotiating the North American Free Trade Agreement] , [ARGM-ADV: saying both of the United States ' neighbors had been very difficult] .

U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday railed against [ARG0: Mexico and Canada 's] efforts in [V: renegotiating] [ARG1: the North American Free Trade Agreement] , saying both of the United States ' neighbors had been very difficult .
